member.name: M:Output.DataStructures.QuadTree.Subdivide
member.summary: Create the quads as four equal regions in reference to this quad.

member.name: M:Output.DataStructures.QuadTree.Delete(Output.DataStructures.Node)
member.summary: Removes the first position from the quad tree at the position passed.
member.returns: A true indicates a position was successfully removed.

member.name: M:Output.DataStructures.QuadTree.QueryBounds(Duality.Rect)
member.summary: Find all points within an axis aligned bounding box.
member.param: An axis aligned bounding box to find all points in the quadtree.
member.returns: A list of Vectors representing all positions within the AABB passed.
